content.text:
Name the Artist of <image 1>:

A. CLAUDE MONET
B. HENRI MATISSE
C. HENRI DE TOULOUSE-LAUTREC
D. EDOUARD MANET

The artist of the image is C. Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec. This poster is one of his famous works featuring Jane Avril, a well-known can-can dancer of the time. The style and signature on the bottom right corner also confirm this attribution.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
